modName: Metal Boss Music Mod- Dovakiin covers
summary: Like the Skyrim battle music, but still want to get your rock\\metal fix? NOW YOU CAN!
descriptionHtml:
NEWS UPDATE!!!: I have put up the working ALL BATTLES ARE METAL 2 file. This has all of the metal songs and optional plugins in one file; and is smaller now. I also fixed the 4th added metal song pluging; it was mp3\'s before, now it is XMW. Sorry for the mp3 mix up.
*****************************************************************************************

Like the Skyrim battle music, but still want to get your rock\\metal fix? NOW YOU CAN!

I went and ripped the songs from these YouTube videos and made them play when you have boss battles; i.e. dragons and harder bad guys.

INSTALLATION:
Just upload it using mod manager as a plug in.

CURRENT UPDATES:
I have made a All Boss Are Metal2 download that has all of the optional music files already in it. I also changed the format from WAV to XMW; so it won\'t be as big of a file. 
NOTE: If you have already downloaded ALL FIGHTS ARE METAL version 1.0 and both of the optional files, you don\'t need to download 2.0. RE-DOWNLOAD THE 4TH ONE, it was mp3 before which won\'t work.

NOTE2: when running added song plugins with NMM and it ask to replace the files hit, \"yes to all\"

UP-INCOMEING:
I will be adding more music options for battle and walking songs as well.

***OTHER MODS LIKE THIS THAT I HAVE DONE***:
This mod is like this one but it s a hand picked compilation of Pokemon battle music covers.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16720

LINKS:
Here is a link to the 3 songs that i used


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UW7EnixZVNI


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OPtVdK7OzpE


3rd Added Dovakiin Metal Cover Song; with BF3 influences
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-lymiQDbfo 

4th Added Dovakiin Metal Cover Song;  sbeast64
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyCFuP3rM2w
author: rocker409
